summary: A collection of concise example scripts illustrating fundamental Python and Cython language features, including type casting, C library interaction for file handling, optional subclassing, method overriding, referenceâ€‘count management, binary struct packing, type qualifiers, and union type hints.
business_intent: Serve as educational material to help developers quickly grasp and apply core Python/Cython concepts when learning the language or building Cython extensions.
